scripts.build:packages: npm run sync-factories && npm --prefix shared run build && npm --prefix functions run build
scripts.test:coverage:html: npm run build:packages && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --coverage && xdg-open coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.test:api:ordered: npm run build:packages && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --runTestsByPath tests/functions/users.test.js tests/functions/settings.test.js tests/functions/clienti.test.js tests/functions/attachments.test.js tests/functions/comments.test.js
scripts.test:e2e:with-build: npm run build:packages && npm run test:e2e
scripts.cypress:open: CYPRESS_ELECTRON_FLAGS="--no-sandbox --disable-gpu --disable-dev-shm-usage --disable-features=VizDisplayCompositor --no-zygote" ELECTRON_DISABLE_SANDBOX=1 xvfb-run -a --server-args="-screen 0 1280x720x24" npx cypress open --browser electron
scripts.cypress:run: CYPRESS_ELECTRON_FLAGS="--no-sandbox --disable-gpu --disable-dev-shm-usage --disable-features=VizDisplayCompositor --no-zygote" ELECTRON_DISABLE_SANDBOX=1 xvfb-run -a --server-args="-screen 0 1280x720x24" npx cypress run --browser electron
